entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add an SortedList.TryAdd and TryGetValue overload that returns the int-based index of an entry #109088
  • [API Proposal]: Add AVX10v2 API to add Avx10.2 support #109083
  • [AVX10.2]Optimize codegen for x86 using the new minmax instructions when possible. #109081
    10.0.0
  • publishing Blazor with AOT is now broken in 8.0.10 AspNetCore #109089
  • [AVX10.2]Optimize codegen for x86 using the new saturating conversion instructions when possible. #109080
    10.0.0
  • Missing activity due to invalid nibble encoding in ActivityTracker.AddIdToGuid for some 12 bits values in EventPipe ActivityID generation #109078
  • JIT: Optimize LINQ style fast path casts #109077
    10.0.0
  • Diagnostics client fails to create dump when path has spaces #109075
  • question about understand interp generate transform code #109072
    Future
  • `chrome-DebuggerTests.GetPropertiesTests` timing out #109070
  • Issues with the new .NET 9+ Mono Debugger #109067
  • [mono] ios library mode use #109065
  • Android App .Net 8-Consume WCF with large data time out #109068
  • SubReadStream in System.IO.Compression is Non-Seekable, Limiting Efficient Data Access #109064
    10.0.0

Closed

  • X509CertificateLoader fails to read cat files #109046
    Future
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_64208/Runtime_64208/Runtime_64208.cmd #108830
    10.0.0
  • [Regression] SIGSEGV on linux-arm64 self-contained trimmed single-file .NET 9 app #108327
    9.0.0
  • Custom attributes are lost when configuring TraceListeners via an XML configuration file #108428
    10.0.0
  • Options Duplicated ListItem #109015
    Future
  • Inconsistent AssemblyVersion of Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions between .NET and .NET462 #109044
    Future
  • [System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext] Add a method to load specific assembly attributes #108746
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance is creating non-empty generic collections #109034
  • mono sgen problem #85318
    Future
  • KeyedService.AnyKey -> not working correctly #109016
  • Behaviour of exceptions in `List<T>.LastIndexOf` doesn't match with documentation #109054
  • [Proposal] Efficient Dictionary Initialization #109029
    Future
  • Auto-filling of tracking issues for CI jobs failures on main #93468
    Future
  • .NET 8.0.10 vs 9.0.0 RC2 GC Server Performance Regression in Sep (CSV Parser) Benchmark (due to DATAS default) #109047
  • SOAP Service Need To Accept Content-Type Of "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". #108989
  • Trace.IndentLevel does not behave consistently when used from multiple threads #15009
  • Make System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo non-RID specific #17041
  • Validate the format of the display strings at ValidateDebuggerDisplayReferences call sites #20023
  • Desktop: BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWriteEvent.Test_WriteEvent_Manifest_EventListener failed with "System.InvalidOperationException" #21295
  • Desktop: BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_NamedEventSource failed with "Xunit.Sdk.EqualException" #21297
  • [DiagnosticsSource] http correlation protocol should not force to make Request-Id unique #22777
  • Investigate Ways to Reduce Dependence on Reflection for EventSource #22793
  • [DiagnosticsSource] http correlation protocol should optionally support intrinsic sort #22794
  • [DiagnosticsSource] Hierarchical Request-Id to support unbounded traces #22860
  • HierarchicalRequestId in .net core applications? #23574
  • EventSource: Improve debug message more clear #23844
  • System.Diagnostics.Tracing.Tests: BasicEventSourceTests.TestEventCounter: Test_Write_Metric_EventListener #24036
  • Add cross platform support for CLR Runtime counters (JIT, GC) #25945
  • TraceSource indent bug #25714
  • Introduce an alternate way to work with EventSource that is not-so-magical #26045
  • [WIP] Fire generic Start and Stop DiagnosticSource events when Activity is Started and Stopped #26469
  • DiagnosticSourceEventSource throws "System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type" under load #26632
  • FileVersionInfo InternalName and OriginalFilename have unexpected suffix on Unix #27203
  • Derived EventSource type fails to generate ETW manifest when a member function contains Nullable parameter #27621
  • GetFileVersion of win32 exe (like innosetup) from unix systems #27736
  • The System.Diagnostics.StackTrace returns empty StackFrame for some exception #28423
  • Debug.Flush() is not wired to Trace.Listeners #29698
  • Handle portable PDBs in System.Diagnostics.StackTrace tests #29795
  • Question: is there an api to get system cpu/memory/disk usage across platforms #30040
  • Question: Start Activity from Hosted Service example #30113
  • Some Performance Counter Categories doesnot get instantiated properly #30183

PullRequests

Created

  • Initialize managed and native values in the ICustomMarshaler marshaler to null when the other is null. #109092
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Change return type for MemberData tests to array #109090
    needs-area-label
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [ilasm] Don't try to overrun the buffer in emitMetaData #109086
    needs-area-label
  • [draft] [GC] Don't promote gen0 when it is mostly objects moved to the finalization queue #109085
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix up `BBJ_CALLFINALLY/BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` pairs after reordering blocks #109084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] fix 4GB JS interop #109079
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix return address hijacking with CET #109074
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • [RISC-V] Opt `emitLoadImmediate` #109062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [cmake] add osx support in CMakePresets.json #109061
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Fix folding of GC pointer arithmetic in lowering #108838
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove workaround in http/ssl stress test docker files #109066
    area-System.Net
  • Put brotli on the FetchContent plan #107166
    area-System.IO.Compression, 10.0.0
  • Fix the ListenerElement.Attributes property #108936
    area-System.Configuration, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use `BitVec` with `bbPostorderNum` key to track visited blocks during value numbering #108943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add CoherentParentDependency on node packages #109022
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [debugger] Opening the inspector session can fail with other exceptions than cancellation #109063
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix typo #108022
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Correct JsonPolymorphicAttribute.TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName documentation spelling #108021
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Change the PAGE_SIZE to obtain from 'Environment.SystemPageSize' for CoreRoot testcases: 'MisSizedStructs_ArmArch' and 'Runtime_65937'. #108917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Run new block layout only in backend #107634
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete duplicate blank issue template. #109057
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Move static helpers to managed #108167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix GC stress log and analysis #108655
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove PAL_Random and move palrt APIs into the minipal #108999
    area-Infrastructure
  • [API Implementation]: Expose CookieException constructors #109026
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • implement optimized nibblemap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Track visited blocks in LSRA with post-order number-based `BitVec` #108932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add managed MachO signing #108992
    area-HostModel
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [NativeAOT/ARM64] Generate frames compatible with Apple compact unwinding #107766
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-CodeGen-coreclr, os-ios, os-tvos, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Remove support for emitting and loading Itanium-64 assemblies #108084
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add EventSource event method generation #107176
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [cdac] PrecodeStubs and CDacMetadata contracts #109030
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Allow stack allocate objects in loops #106526
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Remove *.pp file #108998
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoiding discarding exception details of `MissingMethodException` in `RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl` #108876
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Expose GCInfo size and EH clause count as metrics #109035
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] stop using mmap/munmap #108512
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Unify dotnet/runtime on using Arcade -publish #108990
    area-Infrastructure
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, Future
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [WIP] WebSocket stress #108770
    area-System.Net
  • Update stepping through ExternalMethodFixup under the Debugger #108942
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Exit with quick_exit when using debug UCRT #109006
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 130.0.6723.58, windows: 130.0.6723.59 #109053
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] testing #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `runtimelab/feature/async2-experiment` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #2723

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable PerfTracing #2725
  • documented swift closures #2724

Merged

  • [SwiftBindings] added basic function and tuple demangling #2718
  • Update async2 experiment from upstream #2717

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Oct 24 #2720

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot find .NET SDK installation from PATH enviroment. #44340
  • Participate `dotnet tool` as first-class resource for DSC operations #44325

Closed

  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030

Created

Merged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix SB assembly version test #44334

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Source-Build License Scan Baselines and Exclusions #44329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Aspire fixes #44313

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: allow updating assembly and module level attributes #75572
  • IDE0001 false positive on nullable attributes #75570
  • "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 when using IEnumerable<ReadOnlySpan<>> as a return value #75569
  • Hot Reload fails to apply change with "Unexpected null - file EditSession.cs line 705" #75567

Closed

  • Collection expressions may result in unnecessary tail increment #74875
    17.13
  • FormattingTestBase.AssertFormatAsync ignores the 'debugMode' test validation parameter #44225
    Backlog
  • Inline parameter hints should show for type parameters #47014
    Backlog
  • Completion can be triggered in Metadata as Source and Generated Source files #47207
    Backlog
  • Metadata as Source files and source generated files let you copy the file path to the temporary file #47210
    Backlog
  • Set-up AbstractCSharpCompletionProviderTests to be able to use ReferenceAssemblies #50368
    Backlog
  • xmlDocCommentAttributeValue classification type not applied #50091
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent C# highlighting for property of anonymous type #50099
    Backlog
  • Idea: project/package level code snippet #50125
    Backlog
  • When using "Implement Interface" to generated methods, VS adds them inside #region #30512
    Backlog
  • Regex HighLighting fails with verbatim interpolated string #34748
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] Editor has variable name casing issue in ElseIf statement #48745
    Backlog
  • Sort implementer class methods in order they defined in interface #46273
    Backlog
  • Visual indicator for deprecated code #48330
    Backlog
  • Clean up solution asset serialization #49973
    Backlog
  • Complete a catch with default exception and braces #38631
    Backlog
  • Migrate RDT accesses to a free-threaded service and remove the async wireup of Open Documents #49879
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] No need for EndIf error #49558
    Backlog
  • NullReferenceException from Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.EditAndContinue.BreakpointSpans.CreateSpanForConstructorDeclaration #49779
    Backlog
  • Convert switch statement to expression produces poor formatting when arguments on separate lines. #49809
    Backlog
  • Introduce local variable doesn't work for all cases #49496
    Backlog
  • Analyzer for Make Variable Constant #49675
    Backlog
  • use different hash algorithm than SHA1 in checksum for better performance #33411
    Backlog
  • Bug using "Fix all occurrences" preview dialog #49358
    Backlog
  • Add C# refactoring for invert boolean #47602
    Backlog
  • Revisit project state comparison in EnqueueProjectConfigurationChangeWorkItemAsync #41804
    Backlog
  • SyntaxEditor.RemoveNode does not remove preceeding blank lines for attribute node removal #44342
    Backlog
  • Production of error squiggles in left diff pane regressed in VS 16.7 Preview #45329
    Backlog
  • Checksum calculation depends on temporary storage #46166
    Backlog
  • 'InlineTemporaryCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error #47058
    Backlog
  • Bad refactoring -- convert to LINQ #37661
    Backlog
  • In VB.NET, add hover-over property values within With/EndWith blocks when debugging #49043
    Backlog
  • Provide Constructor Refactoring Using Tuple Syntax #49037
    Backlog
  • Support metadata items in Ctrl+T in some way #49122
    Backlog
  • Advanced members not showing in completion lists #44134
    Backlog
  • C# document viewing using regions and smart comments. #48846
    Backlog
  • Make it easy to edit refactoring option from the Editor, #48843
    Backlog
  • Configure background code analysis per severity. #48849
    Backlog
  • "Use auto property" Quick Action (when applied to whole document) does not refactor the last property when there is more than one being refactored #48890
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] Sometimes, editor doen't append missing `( )` after method names #48581
    Backlog
  • Object Intellisense Completion for Init-Only Classes #46297
    Backlog
  • A way to prevent "items from unimported namespaces" from suggesting extension methods with the "this" parameter of type "object" or extension methods from unimported namespaces not defined in this solution #48845
    Backlog
  • [VB.NET] Debug Mode doesn't support With blocks #48681
    Backlog
  • Refactor a local variable to a class member/property #47796
    Backlog
  • Improve test coverage for IsMemberDeclaration method #48163
    Backlog
  • Change signature - Add parameter colorizes preview incorrectly #47986
    Backlog
  • Generating overrides doesn't add the [AllowNull] attribute on properties #47828
    Backlog
  • "Show potential fixes" is triggered by refactorings unrelated to a diagnostic #47636
    Backlog
  • Add an option to generate new class with fields #47605
    Backlog
  • Quick Action to remove namespace prefix #47595
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: Generate record default GetHashCode and Equals methods #47969
    Backlog
  • Unreported unused private field #47823
    Backlog
  • Make `IDocumentationCommentSnippetService` public #48559
    Backlog
  • Improve discoverability of code refactorings #35525
    Backlog
  • Classify redefined record member declarations and implicit interface implementations #47735
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: Local variables not available in code completion when there is no space between If and "(" #46041
    Backlog
  • Analyzer for possible wrong Roslyn API usage, and improve exception #48010
    Backlog
  • Improve IntelliSense function parameter completion #48021
    Backlog
  • VS 2019: Cannot replace multi-line selection with a new line in VB.Net editor. #48065
    Backlog
  • Rule proposal: Simplify VisualBasic TryCast and DirectCast calls #48239
    Backlog
  • Button or link to show overloads of method. #46271
    Backlog
  • Round Tripping Causes SyntaxNode.IsEquivalentTo() to Fail When There Are No Changes #32737
    Backlog
  • Investigate writing an integration test for Tools Options CodeStyle page #43813
    Backlog
  • "Suppress warning" actions available but have no effect during build #44615
    Backlog
  • Populate the Catch in a try catch with appropriate Exceptions #47798
    Backlog
  • Copying property values from one object (source) to another one or more objects that may or may not be related to the source object #47809
    Backlog
  • Intellisense too quick to insert `=> throw new NotImplementedException()` #47634
    Backlog
  • CS1061 CodeFix should suggest to add using for generic extension method when non-generic method with same name present #47698
    Backlog
  • Update IntelliSense tooltips to show actual type of alias #47200
    Backlog
  • FindAllReferences doesn't find usages of GetAsyncEnumerator in await foreach #45352
    Backlog
  • Move CompilationOptions, ParseOptions serialization/deserialization to ObjectReader/ObjectWriter #45841
    Backlog
  • Exception while loading projects #46808
    Backlog
  • Harden ObjectReader/ObjectWriter against invalid data #45839
    Backlog
  • Allow Signature Help API documentation's URL to be clickable #47437
    Backlog
  • Snippets: Filter available snippets by Kind #44122
    Backlog
  • Code fix 'convert to method' can generate invalid code #47287
    Backlog
  • problem with intellisense/autocomplete in an IF statement in VB.Net #36412
    Backlog
  • a wizard to convert C# code to nullable reference types #47009
    Backlog
  • Pulling up an event to an interface should not add/reproduce the nullable annotation #40292
    Backlog
  • Feature: Containing Type column in references window might include namespaces #46535
    Backlog
  • Analyzer reports unused constructor for MEF components. #46887
    Backlog
  • Tooltip Comments #47002
    Backlog
  • Mark string as string interpolation #46425
    Backlog
  • Inadequate proposal for removing a conversion #46756
    Backlog
  • Display region name in the navigation breadcrumbs #46567
    Backlog
  • Show pattern formats in intellisense for Guid.ToString #46867
    Backlog
  • Navigate to Type / Go to Implementation for Libraries which are not part of your solution #25472
    Backlog
  • intellisense #define suggestions are nonsense #46473
    Backlog
  • Improve snippet completion experience #46842
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense: Hovering the '.' before a method presents the first overload in the method group instead of the overload actually being used #46624
    Backlog
  • Search members in Intelli Sense by summary comments #46628
    Backlog
  • Improve stack trace view with navigation and colorization #46641
    Backlog
  • Additional outlining options #46632
    Backlog
  • Interactive window does not show inline parameter name hints #46790
    Backlog
  • Generate file_header_template from comment #46705
    Backlog
  • New InvalidOperationException in Renamer.RenameSymbolAsync for VS 16.7+ #45652
    Backlog
  • 'VisualBasicAddAccessibilityModifiersCodeFixProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #46513
    Backlog
  • "Pull members up to base type" should allow specifying which partial declaration to move the member to #46483
    Backlog
  • Naming rule for optional prefix #46205
    Backlog
  • Completion should not target type after cast #13682
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #75559
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused parameter #75571
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75555
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • [release/dev17.12] EE: Handle notification when metadata has been invalidated (#75423) #75518
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Skip tests on Mono #75160
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Platform - Mono CoreClr, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Do not lex `..` as a single DotDotToken #75549
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prefer Cancel() rather than Commit() when rename is async. #75562
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use PackageDownloadAndReference to avoid including msbuild dependencies #75561
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • When replacing CodeStyle analyzers do not provide Features analyzers fallback options #75534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Revise expression parsing #75553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Field-backed properties: recognize field in interpolated string #75566
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • ClrOnly condition is not working on mono #75548
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities: FileMultipartSection.FileStream.Length is missing value initially #58555
  • Perf regression: endpoint, fortunes_ntex #58554
  • Perf improvement: https, json #58553
  • Move ProblemDetails outside of Asp.Net Core #58551
  • SignalR in Electron not working #58545
  • Health propagation between API an UI not possible due to sealed & un(de)serializable #58541
  • [Blazor] css isolation does not work if the class is set to an element inside a loop #58540
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware, single_query #58536
  • SignalR WebSocket Connection Fails Due to Excessive URL Length When Using Large JWT Access Tokens in Blazor WebAssembly #58534

Closed

  • The referenced MessagePack has a known vulnerability #58532
    9.0.0
  • DateOnly and TimeOnly is not supported in Blazor change detection for parameters #49021
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Blazor: Use of `--no-build` with `dotnet publish` breaks content with .NET 9 SDK #58321
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries, plaintext #58451
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes #58537
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ntex, fortunes_spring #58515
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext_spring #58531

PullRequests

Created

  • Update `HtmlAttributePropertyHelper` to correctly follow the `MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute` contract #58558
    feature-hot-reload, area-ui-rendering
  • Fix InstallJdk script #58557
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Use MacOS-13 in CI #58549
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [release/9.0] Update Messagepack dependency #58556

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Assets file ‘C:\*\obj\project.assets.json' doesn't have a target for 'net9.0-ios'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net9.0-ios' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #25431
  • Animations are not working in Xiaomi HyperOS (and Oppo ColorOS) #25428
  • ConstraintLayout - DimensionRatio on Android Platform issue #25427
  • .Net 8/ 9 Memory leaks #25425
  • Add check for `Shell` so if users try to push to it or not set it as the root we throw a more helpful exception #25423
    Backlog
  • ListViewRenderer Crash in HostApp #25421
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Unable to customize scrollbar on ListView #25415
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Navigation.PushModalAsync memory leak #25410
  • NRE when setting images on buttons with a null ImageSource on iOS in 8.0.92 #25409
    .NET 8 SR9 8.0.93
  • Bindable property doesn't set properly when it is a member of BindableObject #25407
    Backlog
  • [XC] Properly compile BindingExtension to avoid AOT warnings #25406
  • Update Notification Not Working Properly With Sideloaded Windows App | MAUI #25405

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid + Web solution template missing project refs in .sln when created via VS Code #22381
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • WebView causes empty window popup and closes immediately #24933
    .NET 9 SR1
  • MAUI Android ListView using ViewCell with cells with borders does not appear to wrap text when Label has LineBreakMode="WordWrap" #25219
  • System.IndexOutOfRangeException: IItemsViewSource is empty #25357
  • TapGestureRecognizer not working on iOS from maui 8.0.80 and onward #25237
  • TitleBar visual state typo #25245
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • RC2 : Maui App failed to build with XamlC error : Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #25309
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [TitleBar] Fix commented out TitleBar style #25248
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Unable to load library libSkiaSharp #25208
  • .NET MAUI Windows app can't start #25372
  • .net9 RC2 - Compiled Bindings - cannot resolve type in StaticResource #25172
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • ios smart quotes replacing normal double quotes when a json file is loaded with the file picker #25168

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0.1xx] [Blazor Hybrid] Fire and forget `BlazorWebView` disposal by default #25430
  • Fix for issue 24557 Android OnKeyUp not capturing keypresses #25429
  • Merge NET9 GA into main #25422
  • Add New .NET MAUI Template with Syncfusion Toolkit Integration #25419
    area-templates, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    community ✨
  • [Android] RefreshView in a grid #25413
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-refreshview
  • [iOS] Use non-overridden traits in AppInfoImplementation.RequestTheme #25412
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-essentials, community ✨
  • [Android] CarouselView: Remove rounding from SizedItemContentView that results in off-by-one pixel error #25411
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [testing] These Semantic tests seem to fail often on MacCatalyst #25408
    area-testing, testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android]: Preserve the ActivityResultRegistry During MauiAppCompatActivity Creation #25404
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨

Merged

  • Set title on maui-blazor/-app template window #25426
    area-blazor, area-templates
  • Bump Android Dependencies #25424
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [XC] Avoid NativeAOT trim warnings for compiled bindings #25420
    area-xaml, .NET 9.0 GA
  • [gh actions] introduce "inclusive heat sensor" #25389

Updated

  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Updates for ASPNET GA branding #25348
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • [ios,tests] Fix iOS Header with Group #25157
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR1
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Propagate any Page.Title to the window, not just for Shell #25338
    area-templates, area-controls-window
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • [Android] Fixed CollectionView MeasureFirstItem Rendering issue #25367
    community ✨
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Windows] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • [Testing] More ignore attributes for UITests #25345

  • [iOS] Fix for Single item alignment issue in CollectionView HorizontalGrid Layout #25370

  • Perf : ButtonContentTypeConverter now using InvariantCulture to parse… #25393

  • Remove excessive BoxView API comments #25399

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider the role of value converters in determining the default value of a non-nullable column added to an existing table #34952
    Backlog
  • Consider using the type mapping default database value in the update pipeline #34951
    Backlog
  • Consider handling DNS errors as transient #34950
    Backlog
  • Format of the initialization string does not conform to specification starting at index #34946
  • Allow value types as optional properties, using the sentinel value to detect when they're set #34943
    Backlog

Closed

  • Deleted column won't go away #34942
  • What is the difference? OrderBy InvalidOperationException: The LINQ expression ... could not be translated #34949
  • Cascading saving Nth level changing child #34941
  • 'Expression in the SQL tree does not have a type mapping assigned' on ternary with non-null condition and string operation only #34618
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.12.1 to 1.13.0 #34948
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.44.0 to 3.44.1 #34947
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Use right hand type mapping for more binary expressions when left is an object #34729
